dlgLine.text: Whoa... Hey.
So, did you have a request?

dlgAnsw.text: I'm a big fan. I listen to you every day.
Yikes, it smells like a gorilla butthole in here.
Come with me if you want to live.
First off - your taste in music sucks...

dlgLine.text: Who... <Cough>Are you real?

dlgAnsw.text: Are you okay? I was worried you might have died.
Nope, I'm the hipster fairy, here to take you to DJ Heaven.
You don't look too good. Can you walk?
No, I'm the ghost of new wave - yes, I'm fucking real!

dlgLine.text: Cool.
You're not here to kill me... Right?

dlgAnsw.text: I came to get you out. You can't stay here, it's not safe.
I'm here to save your life. You could be a bit more, I don't know, enthusiastic.
Maybe... That depends on how willing you are to play 'Freebird' as your next song.
I was just passing by, looking for stuff. I didn't expect to find this place.

dlgLine.text: Really, I thought it smelled more like a boar's.
But, oh, here's a question - who are you?

dlgAnsw.text: I came to get you out. You can't stay here, it's not safe.
I'm here to save your life. You could be a bit more, I don't know, enthusiastic.
I brought a tape of my jam band - maybe you could give it a spin?
I was just passing by, looking for stuff. I didn't expect to find this place.

dlgLine.text: Yeah, I saw that movie too. You've been just waiting to use that, haven't you?

dlgAnsw.text: No, seriously - you can't stay here, it's not safe.
I'm here to save your life. You could be a bit more, I don't know, enthusiastic.
I was just passing by, looking for stuff. I didn't expect to find this place.

dlgLine.text: Um... No.
Oh and... who exactly are you?

dlgAnsw.text: I came to get you out. You can't stay here, it's not safe.
I'm here to save your life. You could be a bit more, I don't know, enthusiastic.
I came to apply for the night shift - I brought some awesome smooth jazz CDs with me.
I was just passing by, looking for stuff. I didn't expect to find this place.

dlgLine.text: Do I know you? No, you don't sound like anyone I talked to on the radio...

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Well, that just shoots down all my beliefs or lack thereof.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: I know how to walk... Willing myself to do so, that's kind of the tough part right now.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: I feel dead, so, you know, just checking.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: So... are you part of a rescue patrol or something? Is it all over?

dlgAnsw.text: I'm afraid not. I'm from a shelter. Sounded like you could use a rescue.
Hardly. In fact, the more time we waste, the sooner those things will find us.
Do you need medical assistance?

dlgLine.text: Not safe? Do you see any dead people around here? I haven't seen anything living or dead since I've been out here. I'd say it's pretty damn safe, wouldn't you?

dlgAnsw.text: If I found this place, it's only a matter of time before someone more dangerous does.
Maybe right now, but what about when you run out of food?
Fine, stay here... I don't care.

dlgLine.text: Save me from what? You're the first person I've seen out here - living or dead. I'd say I'm pretty safe here, wouldn't you?

dlgAnsw.text: If I found this place, it's only a matter of time before someone more dangerous does.
Maybe right now, but what about when you run out of food?
Fine, stay here... I don't care.

dlgLine.text: No... No way. Just... no.

dlgAnsw.text: I came to get you out. You can't stay here, it's not safe.
I'm here to save your life. You could be a bit more, I don't know, enthusiastic.
I was just passing by, looking for stuff. I didn't expect to find this place.

dlgLine.text: Exactly. Kind of the reason I came out here in the first place - it's off the radar. Why you would come all the way out here looking for supplies, I have no idea.

dlgAnsw.text: Just lucky, I guess. Lucky for you too. I have a shelter over in Splendid - come with me, it's not safe here.
Logic, mostly. I mean, if you've survived this long, certainly you've got plenty of supplies here.
I'm sure you're too busy here to come with me. I'll let you get back to your station.

dlgLine.text: Okay, that's a valid argument. I'm sorry - I just have this habit of calling people out on their bullshit - but yes, you're right. I've pretty much told this whole region I'm out here - I just didn't expect anyone to find me or care to look.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: I don't know. I was kind of hoping the world would have moved on to the same old grind by then. It's not though... I mean, you're not part of an organized rescue group, are you?

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Wait, wait, wait... You're the first person I've seen in forever and... I'm suspicious as heck, naturally. But... what's it like out there? I mean... really. Is anyone coming? Someone's still around - FEMA or NATO or hell, even the ASPCA... right?

dlgAnsw.text: Nobody's coming. I may be the last person you ever see.
Maybe. But then again, maybe not.
Time's wasting - are you coming or not?

dlgLine.text: Oh... Should have expected the first person to find me would be an asshole. It's Texas - the odds are exceptional...

dlgAnsw.text: No - I'm saying gather your supplies and come with me.
Just stay out of my way and you won't get hurt.
You got something against Texans, boy?
You keep your supplies... Now that I've met you, I think I'm best off leaving you here.

dlgLine.text: But if I leave... There are people out there listening... Depending on me. I can't just walk away. You understand, right?

dlgAnsw.text: Help me find them. Save people with your own hands rather than your words.
You did good work here. But there's talk and action, and now's the time for action.
It's leaving with me right now or die out here alone - no one else is coming.
You're right - you should stay here and continue to help people.

dlgLine.text: Oh. Well, I have absolutely zero reason to trust you and I'm not saying no...

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Oh, sure - can I help you load your pack? Yeah, I'd love to starve out here in the Texas sun. That sounds awesome.
But wait - I was going to use this gun on myself eventually, but why don't I give it a test run on your ass?

dlgAnsw.text: I like you. You know what? Forget the murder you and take your stuff plan - why don't you come with me instead?
Okay, okay - I won't make you suffer. I'll give you a quick death.
Oh, yes... I'll be sure to kill you ironically, you hipster trash.
Forget it... It's not worth the trouble. Sorry to bother you.

dlgLine.text: Yeah. They're... how should I put this... Mutants? Is that the word... no, gimme a sec....

dlgAnsw.text: I don't like those assholes either. You're okay - why don't you come with me.
You best be careful about those next words...
Look, why don't you just give me those supplies and I'll let you go back to doing your thing here.
Okay, before I leave, did you want to shut up and think about coming with me?

dlgLine.text: Yokels? Is that the word? Morons? Throwbacks... wait - fucking moronic throwbacks. Fatass all-you-can-eat SUV driving Jesus-humping cowboy hat-wearing motherfuckers? Help me out here.

dlgAnsw.text: Okay, you son of a bitch - you worked my last good nerve. I'm going to bury you here!
I'm going to get out of here before I do something I regret.

dlgLine.text: I always knew my mouth was going to be the death of me... Or not - let's do this.

dlgAnsw.text: <Lane reaches for his gun.>

dlgLine.text: That's the second most bizzare thing that's ever been said to me. I'm oddly convinced to.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Okay... Maybe I can find some of the people I've talked to. Actually... I'd really like that. I'm in.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: That's pretty dark. So, you came from somewhere? Where?

dlgAnsw.text: I can't have you broadcasting that info. Sorry. But I can take you there.
Come with me - I'll show you.
You're wasting my time here. I have others waiting for me.

dlgLine.text: I'm going to sign off one final time... While I'm doing that, feel free to gather up my stuff. I'll be with you in a moment. Going to miss this place, oddly.

dlgAnsw.text: When you're done, we'll show you the way back. Welcome to the group, Lane.
Hurry up. We still have to make it back.

dlgLine.text: I guess when you put it that way... Okay.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Do you help people? I mean... Wherever you're from - can it sustain those people out there? Because if so, I'd like to come along.

dlgAnsw.text: I think it can. And we could use you.
Maybe. We'll see how you work out once you get there.

dlgLine.text: Whoa... Who the heck are... No way - you're Aggro Moss! No way... This has got to be heatstroke or something.
Hey... Have I seen you somewhere before?
I was at your concert in Dublin? I talked to you at the bar about your new album? Bought you a drink?
In Ireland? Man, I barely remember that tour.
No, in Dublin, Texas. At that shitty club. A few weeks ago? You don't remember anything?
No, no... uh, hey... guy.

dlgAnsw.text: We're here to get you out of here.
<Whistle> Hey! You can catch up later. You, DJ, pack your bags, you're coming with us.
I hate to pee in your spaghetti, dude, but we're here for your stuff.

dlgLine.text: Wait a sec... You mean to tell me I get to go hang out with Aggro Moss... all the time? I mean, don't get me wrong, I feel a responsibility to my listeners, but... that sounds too good to be true.
Dial the creepy down, dude.

Just geeking out - apologies. Look, I don't know how you found me and I'm really glad to see you're alive, Aggro, but... some of those people out there, they count on me to get them through their day. I just can't leave - you understand?

dlgAnsw.text: I can't promise they'll all be rock stars, but you can help me look for others out there.
It's leaving with me right now or die out here alone - no one else is coming.

dlgLine.text: What, really?
C'mon, he seems alright. Just take him with us.

dlgAnsw.text: Fine. He can come with us.
I don't need another mouth to feed. Let's just see if he's got anything useful.

dlgLine.text: Whoa... wait a sec - I can be plenty useful. I'm not just a music guy - I kept this place running, I know how to use a pistol, I've worked all kinds of shitty odd jobs to support my music habit. Hey - if it means hearing Aggro Moss play live again, I'll do anything.

dlgAnsw.text: I don't know... Aggro?
Okay, fine. You can come with us.
Sorry. We just need your stuff.

dlgLine.text: When you put it that way...

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Okay... I just need to do a final signoff... While I'm taking care of that, feel free to start gathering my stuff.
<Whisper to you>If this guy becomes a pain in my ass, you're dealing with him, you know that right?

dlgAnsw.text: When you're done, we'll show you the way back. Welcome to the group, Lane.
Hurry up. We still have to make it back.

dlgLine.text: Sure... whatever.
Thanks. That means a ton.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: I can't let you take my stuff. I don't care who you're with. That's everything I have left.
Don't be a dick - just let the guy come with us.

dlgAnsw.text: Fine. You can follow us back to our shelter.
Shut up, Aggro. You can thank me later when we've got food on the table.

dlgLine.text: If I accidentally shoot you, Aggro - apologies. Let's do this...

dlgAnsw.text: <Lane reaches for his gun.>

dlgLine.text: So... we're not winning, huh? <Cough>Well, I don't see any reason to stay around here anymore, except to die. So hungry, though... I'd scrape the cheese off an old pizza box right now - hell, I'd eat the pizza box. I assume there's food wherever we're going?

dlgAnsw.text: We have food, yes.
If you're willing to work for it, sure.
We don't have time for this. Let's go.

dlgLine.text: No, just food. I'd scrape the cheese off an old pizza box right now - hell, I'd eat the pizza box. I'll go wherever you want as long as there's food.

dlgAnsw.text: We have food, yes.
If you're willing to work for it, sure.
We don't have time for this. Let's go.

dlgLine.text: Then lead the way.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: I'd fist a goat for a snack. Then I'd take a bite out the goat. Whatever you need, just lead the way.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Why not. Not like I have anything left to do here.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Gonna miss this place... In a Stockholm syndrom way.

dlgAnsw.text: We'll show you the way back. Welcome to the group, Lane.
Hope your legs still work. Let's go.
